title: Ultimate 3BR/2.5BA Townhouse - 4288 Lautrec Drive
posting_body: Capture The Charm, Love The Space, Live The Location
This gorgeous 2-story townhouse in Evergreen is located within the best schools - Tom Matsumoto Elementary School Chaboya Middle, and Evergreen Valley High.
Built on 2005 with an amazing floor plan, this corner unit has a private front yard that is perfect for kids to play or to entertain friends and family.
There is a modern and electric fireplace in the living room while the kitchen has been upgraded with a large island and large window.
Other amenities include central air-conditioning and heating, an in-unit washer and dryer, and stainless steel appliances in the kitchen.
The spacious master bedroom is built with his and her closet and enhanced by the natural light from the windows.
Sleekly designed, the master bathroom is beautifully appointed with a walk-in shower and double sinks.
Plantation shutters and throughout the house.
There is a  2-car side-by-side garage with custom cabinets and lots of street parking for guests and extended family.
See for yourself what this home has to offer.
Schedule your private tour today.
